Functions
isCheck type of msg
processProcess a new message
buildMsgHeaderBuild a message header
buildMsgINDATABuilds the INDATA message
buildMsgTASKPROCBuilds the TASK_PROC message
procInDataProcess a new MSG_INDATA message
procTaskProcProcess a new MSG_TASK_PROC message
procTaskResProcess a new MSG_TASK_RES message
setForwardToModify msg header to forward msg to another destination
convertToModify msg header to forward msg to another destination
writeToFileWrite content of physical message to file
